thread.title: Man Goes Viral After Reading Fake Books on Subway That Make Fun of Trump
thread.title_full: Man Goes Viral After Reading Fake Books on Subway That Make Fun of Trump

author: Matthew Facciani
title: Man Goes Viral After Reading Fake Books on Subway That Make Fun of Trump
text:
These are dark times in politics so it’s nice to distract ourselves with some humor when we can. Scott Rogowsky of the YouTube series “Running Late” has gone viral for his latest video showing him reading outrageous fake books on a subway. These books poke fun at Trump and other ridiculous conservatives associated with him. My favorites included: “Mike Pence’s Prejudice & Prejudice” as well as “Fantastic Nukes and Where to Drop Them.” 
The best part of all this is that all the ad revenue Rogowsky gets from his viral video go to support Planned Parenthood and the ACLU. Enjoy! Keep up with my writing, activism, and research by following me on Facebook!
